name: Baldi loves My little pony
description:
Oh boy, now Baldi gets addict to My little pony, to addict that he buys 7 MLP comics, but he lost them, so you need to help him but now each time you get a math problem wrong, Baldi will think you're insulting him, you must know what yo do

Wooden think pad and pony Gotta sweep from WaliGamer
